recipesJson.name: Tamamango
recipesJson.author: ID10-T
recipesJson.description:
Out of at least 100 mango recipes, probably closer to 150, this recipe, based on /u/Tamachicken's "Oh My Mango" is among the tastiest I have ever vaped. 

Shake and vape.

reviews.text: This reminds me exactly of these gummy candies my mom's ex-boyfriend from Germany used to bring us every time he came back to the states, along with the German Pokemon cards. Really takes me back to a simpler time, it's crazy how a recipe can do that. You unintentionally played my nostalgia card really hard man.
Delicious, can't stop vaping it. I regret not getting FLV mango earlier.
I dont even like mangos, a friend asked me to make him something mango.  Really good. Ill be making again, thanks good job
The mango is delicious and blends so well. Great job! Definitely making more of this.
Intense mango fruit flavor with a couple extras. I'm loving the marshmallow underneath. This is very nice.
